text: Lakhdar Brahimi (Algerian pronunciation: ; ; born 1 January 1934) is an Algerian diplomat and politician. He is the United Nations envoy and advisor. Since August 2012, he was the United Nations and Arab League Special Envoy to Syria. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Algerian politicians Category:Algerian diplomats
title: Lakhdar Brahimi
